content: we are really excited to introduce you to ayla the mini crochet mermaid in this free pattern she s a mini version of our zoya mermaid doll 1 using dk yarn she works up to 4 5 inches and is just adorable her pretty flower and unique fin make her the perfect gift for a little girl you can even attach a keychain ring to her she makes for an adorable bag accessory we made her using dk yarn and a 2 5 mm hook but any yarn with the relevant hook will do 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/zoya-the-mermaid-doll
